text: Marceline Loridan-Ivens (19 March 1928Article by Andrew Goldstein in the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette – 18 September 2018) was a French writer and movie director. She was married to Joris Ivens.Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial and Museum Her memoir But You Did Not Come Back details her time in Auschwitz- Birkenau.Publishers Weekly She was born in Épinal, France. Loridan-Ivens died on 18 September 2018 in Paris at the age of 90.Filmmaker Loridan-Ivens, Auschwitz companion of Simone Veil, dies ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Holocaust survivors Category:French movie directors Category:Writers from Grand Est Category:People from Épinal
